#summary API reference for onFps
#labels Phase-Implementation


= onFps =

Called when the FPS(Frame Per Second) callback event is called by the application. Call emo.Event.enableOnFpsCallback function to retrieve this event.

== emo.Event.enableOnFpsCallback(msec) ==

Enable the fps callback event with given milliseconds. After enabling the fps callback, onFps event is called at given interval.

{{{
// onFps event is called at every 5 seconds.
local event = emo.Event();
event.enableOnFpsCallback(5000); 
}}}

== function onFps(fps) ==

Called when the fps callback event is called. The first parameter is the frame per second.

{{{
function onFps(fps) {
  print(format("FPS: %4.2f", fps));
}
}}}
